amendment.description: Amendment allows 16 and 17-year-olds to pre-register to vote ahead of their 18th birthday.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 70 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to allow 16 and 17-year-olds to pre-register to vote ahead of their 18th birthday.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neguse amendment (A052) Agreed to by recorded vote: 239 - 186 (Roll no. 116).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A052) offered by Mr. Neguse.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Neguse amendment (A052) Agreed to by recorded vote: 239 - 186 (Roll no. 116).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
